original_title: SriLankan, SLT, Litro Gas, SLIC among SOEs to undergo divestment process – Finance Ministry
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The State Owned Enterprises Restructuring Unit of the Finance Ministry announced that a decision has been reached for the divestment of shares held by the state of several enterprises based on a cabinet decision reached on 13th March 2023.
The State-Owned Enterprises that will undergo the process are as follows:
The divestment is to be implemented by the State Owned Enterprises Restructuring Unit under the Ministry of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies.
A statement noted that qualified and experienced companies will be appointed for the purpose of consultation or development of the said SOEs by the State Owned Enterprises Restructuring Unit.
